tab1.text1:
We only have three rules, and they are very simple.


1. Do not cheat. This includes mesh nonsense and hacking.


2. You and your tribe can build bases, however, randomly leaving turrets

 and bullshit foundation spam around the map will result 

in structure wipe for tribe. If you build FOB, demo it when you are done.

 Don't build in a cave unless you plan on living there.


3. Don't be toxic. Yes, you can use profanity and fuck with people in global, 

but it must be in moderation and just shit talk banter. 

Dropping racial stuff in global because you are edgey, 

will get you kicked.


 Alternatively, we may have a server event where we give all of your enemies 

rockets to remove you.



IF YOU ARE HAVING PROBLEM GETTING CURSOR TO CLOSE THIS WINDOW, try alt+tab.
tab1.text2:
Character Levels= 105. Pending another config fuckup, this should not 

change. 


Please understand, there is an imbue bench that gives people 755% dmg tools and pike. 

As a result our balance is strongly weighted against what you can do with those max capped items.Dino Max Level wild is currently 300.

With the Primal Chaos Mod, we are still working out balancing.

 I will apologize in advance, in case you wake up one day and the dinos are 150. 


 Secrets about boosted drops

 <TextStyle.White>white drop is resources</>

<TextStyle.Green>Green drops artifacts</>

<TextStyle.Blue>Blue Saddles and misc</>

<TextStyle.Violet>Purple guns</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>yellow armor</>

<TextStyle.Red>red Tek</>

 The drops will have items that you cant get anywhere else. IMPORTANT use the medical station to heal up new tames, and  .

tab2.text1:
We will have various types of contests in the very near future,

 with prizes both in-game and out of game.


Giftcards, whitelist, custom dinos, titles, ingame perks, discord Slayer Role
tab2.text2:
We will have events for scavenger hunts, pvp contests, leaderboard winners, and other 

pvp arena activities once we get more settled in and the game is a little more stable.
